name: RADAR-Camera Sensor Calibration
description: Developed a novel approach for calibrating RADAR and video sensors using NDLT. Built deep learning pipelines (CNN, VGG, RetinaNet) for real-time sensor fusion and automated RADAR annotations.

name: ADAS Development with RADAR
description: Designed Automatic Emergency Braking (AEB) system using 360° Navtech RADAR. Improved safety and navigation capabilities for autonomous mobility.

name: Multimodal Dataset Generation
description: Built synchronized data collection stack integrating RADAR, LiDAR, cameras, and GNSS. Collected multimodal data across varied conditions for autonomous navigation research.

name: RADAR SLAM
description: Led a SLAM project using 360° Navtech RADAR. Processed FFT data for feature extraction, odometry estimation, and environmental mapping.
